import React, { Component } from 'react' import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown, Image, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' class NavBar extends Component { render() { var user = localStorage.getItem('user') if (user) { user = JSON.parse(user) } const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); } return ( <> Railway e-ticketing
{user ? <> My Reservations Account Settings Sign out : <> Sign In Join Now }
{'Home'} {'Contact Us'}
); } } export default NavBar;
